title: Florida Sheriff’s Office Will Not Escort Miami Dolphins Until They Stand For National Anthem?
subtitle: An old rumor that a police department said that it would not protect NFL players until they stood for the National Anthem was rehashed in September 2017 by a disreputable web site.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: A sheriff's department in Florida announced that they would not protect the Miami Dolphins during the 2017 season in retaliation to a player boycott of the National Anthem.
